title: 求大神解救：登录游戏出现这个画面是什么原因
author: ld8509099
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Ticking screen

A full error report has been saved to E:\MC1.52\152蛤蟆客户端新版\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-07-27_10.34.08-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 11d14aa1 --------
Full report at:
E:\MC1.52\152蛤蟆客户端新版\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-07-27_10.34.08-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!

Generated 13-7-27 上午10:34

-- Head --
Stacktrace:

replies.txt_content: 程序崩溃，经常的事，，过一会再登进去

836275353 发表于 2013-7-27 11:47 
程序崩溃，经常的事，，过一会再登进去
翻译：
MINECRAFT已经崩溃！       
      ----------------------       MINECRAFT已停止运行，因为它遇到了一个问题;滴答屏幕 一份完整的错误报告已被保存到E：\ MC1 0.52 \ 152蛤蟆客户端的minecraft新版\ \崩溃报告\崩溃-2013-07-27_10.34.08 client.txt -请包括一个该文件的副本（不是这个画面！）如果您报告任何人崩溃;没有它，他们将不能够帮助修复崩溃：（ --- BEGIN错误报告11d14aa1的-------- 报告全文 Mojang文件表明，此屏幕不仅 生成13-7-27上午10时34分 -总- 堆栈跟踪：

replies.author: shengzinz
replies.txt_content: 客服端跟别的客服端冲突引发的崩溃。 你可以等 一段时间再进~
